repast.simphony.agents.designer.figures

Class DecisionStepToolTipFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • org.eclipse.draw2d.Panel
        • repast.simphony.agents.designer.figures.DecisionStepToolTipFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure, IAgentBuilderToolTip

    public class DecisionStepToolTipFigure
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.Panel
implements IAgentBuilderToolTip
    The Decision Flowlet's tooltip figure which presents the flowlet's if statement
    Author:
    greifa (Adapted by Michael J. North for Use in Repast Simphony from Alexander Greif’s Flow4J-Eclipse (http://flow4jeclipse.sourceforge.net/docs/index.html), with Thanks to the Original Author)
